Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with Body Aches for 6 weeks. he has a history of Lyme Disease for past 3 years. patient is a 37 YO white male police inspector. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 174 cm, Weight 57.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed amoxicillin - 500 mg 3x day, and ordered Synovial fluid cell count panel.

td.content: s:pt presents with Body Aches x 4 weeks. patient is a male police inspector aged 38 ys. pt has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption he denies smoking o:Height 174 cm, Weight 58 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Doxycycline - 100 mg twice per day, and ordered Synovial fluid cell count panel.
